attributes.action: Make Oldham Athletic Football Club a Religion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The legal definition of a religion is a mass group of people, who gather together frequently and who all believe in the same thing. 

I would like to make football a religion as it will allow people who dont believe in a faith already to believe into a certain religion.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
